name: Time x Platform = Difficulty
description:
My first game in 3D.

Your goal is to pass through every checkpoint and get to the finish. 

You can change the flow of time and with it, some platforms and traps can appear or disappear. So, whatever the speed, there are always difficulties, either precision of your movements or harder platforming.

WASD to move, space to jump, UP/DOWN arrows or right/left mouse buttons to change time. R to reset the level if needed. Escape to pause

You can also play with a controller.

Developped on Godot Engine by Yagneel
